content: The Department of Information Technology, established in the year 1999, has grown into a hub of academic and professional excellence, offering a strong blend of theoretical knowledge and practical exposure. With a mission to provide quality education and nurture IT excellence, the department not only focuses on creating skilled technocrats but also aims to develop responsible citizens who can contribute positively to society and industry. Accredited by NBA for its commitment to effective teaching and digital innovation, the department ensures students are equipped with the latest skills and knowledge to meet industry demands. Strong industry linkages through MoUs with Tata Elxsi, Movate, Sify Technologies, and Arjun Vision, among others, support our goal of producing company-ready graduates. Top recruiters like Zoho, Ford, Fleet Studio and Multi Coreware have offered placements with packages up to 14 LPA, maintaining a consistent placement record of 80%. Students are encouraged to participate in hackathons, paper presentations, and technical competitions, often bringing home awards and recognition. With 100% pass results and zero backlogs in recent years, our students set a benchmark in academic success. Faculty members actively publish research and guide student projects aligned with the Sustainable Development Goals, making the department a vibrant center for learning, innovation, and growth.

Empowering innovation through cutting-edge technology solutions, transforming learning experiences with digital excellence, driving operational efficiency through strategic IT initiatives, and securing a dynamic digital future.
To continuously research, develop, and implement innovative technology solutions that empower academic and administrative excellence, fostering a culture of creativity and problem-solving.
To seamlessly integrate digital technologies into every facet of the learning experience, from classrooms to online platforms, ensuring accessibility, engagement, and effectiveness in education.

To engage with the wider community, including alumni, local businesses, and societal stakeholders, to promote digital literacy, foster technology adoption, and contribute to the socio-economic development.
To cultivate a dynamic environment that encourages continual growth, entrepreneurial spirit, cohesive teamwork, exemplary professionalism, and leadership with a strong sense of social responsibility.

content.content: To proactively recognize industry and societal challenges, devising impactful solutions that promote the welfare of both sectors with professional ethics.
To embrace technological evolution by discovering and implementing innovative ideas with leadership qualities to propel continuous learning.
To advance professional careers through collaborative research and advanced studies, ensuring excellence with integrity.
Apply the knowledge of mathematics, science, engineering fundamentals, and an engineering specialization to the solution of complex engineering problems.

Identify, formulate, research literature, and analyze complex engineering problems reaching substantiated conclusions using first principles of mathematics, natural sciences, and engineering sciences.

Design solutions for complex engineering problems and design system components or processes that meet the specified needs with appropriate consideration for public health and safety, and cultural, societal, and environmental considerations.

content.header: PO 4: Conduct investigations of complex problems
content.content: Use research-based knowledge and research methods including design of experiments, analysis and interpretation of data, and synthesis of the information to provide valid conclusions.

Create, select, and apply appropriate techniques, resources, and modern engineering and AI and Data Science tools, including prediction and modelling to complex engineering activities, with an understanding of the limitations.

Apply reasoning informed by the contextual knowledge to assess societal, health, safety, legal and cultural issues and the consequent responsibilities relevant to the professional engineering practice.
Understand the impact of the professional engineering solutions in societal and environmental contexts, and demonstrate the knowledge of, and need for sustainable development.
Apply ethical principles and commit to professional ethics and responsibilities and norms of the engineering practice.
Function effectively as an individual, and as a member or leader in diverse teams, and in multidisciplinary settings.

Communicate effectively on complex engineering activities with the engineering community and with the society at large, such as, being able to comprehend and write effective reports and design documentation, make effective presentations, and give and receive clear instructions.

Demonstrate knowledge and understanding of the engineering and management principles and apply these to one’s own work, as a member and leader in a team, to manage projects and in multidisciplinary environments.
Recognize the need for, and have the preparation and ability to engage in independent and life-long learning in the broadest context of technological change.
To utilize cutting-edge techniques, programming languages, and the latest Information Technology tools and platforms for solving real time applications to meet out the societal and industrial needs.
To design and develop fruitful service utilities and products for various aspects of technological needs involving different domains

content.name: Dr. JEEVAA KATIRAVAN
hod_message: As the Head of the Department of Information Technology, it gives me immense pleasure to share that our field continues to redefine the way the world connects, learns, and evolves. With a strong foundation in education, diverse skill sets, and hands-on experience in cutting-edge technologies, students are empowered to thrive in a competitive and ever-changing digital landscape. For those passionate about developing innovative solutions and eager to engage with real-time technologies, the B.Tech. Information Technology program serves as an ideal platform to transform aspirations into impactful careers. Our future-ready curriculum, combined with valuable industry exposure, equips students to seize emerging opportunities and contribute meaningfully to the tech-driven world. On behalf of our esteemed institution, I, Dr. Jeevaa Katiravan, warmly welcome you to join hands with us in nurturing a future that is innovative, empowered, and filled with possibilities.
content.designation: Professor & Head, Dept of Information Technology

content: The students of the IT department have showcased their excellence by actively participating in various technical events, including paper presentations, hackathons, and coding competitions at Inter college and University levels. Their innovative research and problem-solving skills have earned them accolades in prestigious symposiums and conferences. Notably, our students have presented papers on emerging technologies such as Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain, and Cybersecurity, demonstrating their expertise and commitment to advancements in the field. Their achievements reflect the department’s emphasis on academic excellence, research, and continuous learning, inspiring future batches to strive for greater success.
